triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Deep RL is the core technique used in the paper to develop algorithms that handle invalid action masking in policy gradient methods.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: Policy gradient algorithms are the specific class of RL methods examined in the paper for their handling of invalid actions.

triples.name: Strategy video game
triples.relevance: Strategy games serve as the application domain where invalid actions are a critical problem due to complex rules.

triples.name: Probability distribution
triples.relevance: Discrete action distributions are the source of invalid actions when sampled from without proper masking.

triples.name: Action masking
triples.relevance: The paper provides theoretical justification and empirical analysis of action masking, a novel contribution to handling invalid actions in policy gradient algorithms.
